short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper Chrome Extension for BulkMessageApp Cloud

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a helper extension that will allow the registered user to extract the required group details from WhatsApp, that they can further access in our application.
